price: 8. Uma soo dirno malaa’igta waxaan xaq4 aheyn, lamana sugo oo siiyo (gaalada) fursad markaas (ay ku toobad keenaan) .
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ
footnotes: 4. Macnaha waxaan la soo dirnaa fartiin ama sida laga qaadanayo hal dhaca Aayadda cadaabka loogu goodiyey gaalada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā nunazzilu al-malāikata illā bil-ḥaqi wamā kānū idhan munẓarīna
